start.en: 👋 Hello! Welcome. 👇 To continue, choose from the menu below:

need_subscription.en: 🚫 To use the bot, you must first purchase a monthly subscription to the bot.

select.en: ⬇️ Choose one of the options below:

send_file.en: 🏷 {} survival 💡 Please send a zip file 🗂 Please do not send more than 10,000 accounts

invalid_file.en: ⚠️ Your sent zip file is invalid!

set_settings.en: 🔽 Here you can set your json settings:

send_chat_username.en: ⏬ Send your channel / group username with '@':

help.en: 🔢 - Count of all sessions in zip file 🟢 - Mission completed, or account healthy. 🟡 - Mission failed, or account restricted. ❌ - Account invalid, multiple IP logins, file damaged, or banned. ☑️ - Failed to connect to the server, please recheck the error file.

done.en: ✅ Statistic of process: 🔢 Count all: {} 🟢 Success: {} 🟡 Unsuccess: {} ❌ Invalid: {} ☑️ Failed: {}

error: ⚠️ The operation failed, try again later.
